snippet: The narcotics investigator, who police said appeared to be intoxicated, faces assault and weapons charges; and the victims’ injuries do not appear to be serious.
abstract: Victor H Zambrano Jr, off-duty New York State narcotics investigator, is arrested after his gun discharges during struggle with an acquaintance, injuring two bystanders and sending pedestrians running for cover.
lead_paragraph: The narcotics investigator, who police said appeared to be intoxicated, faces assault and weapons charges; and the victims’ injuries do not appear to be serious.

headline.main: 2 Bystanders Injured in Manhattan in Off-Duty Officer’s Tussle for Gun
headline.print_headline: 2 Bystanders Injured in Manhattan in Off-Duty Officer’s Tussle for Gun
